content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5) and multiple boilers at various positions including (x=-24.5, y=32.0) and (x=1.5, y=1.0), connected by pipes.

### Copper plate mine at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
No copper plate mine structure found.

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory structure found.

### Offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5)
Consists of offshore pump at position(x=-16.5, y=26.5) and multiple pipes connected to it.

### Boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0)
Consists of boiler at position(x=-24.5, y=32.0) and multiple pipes connected to it.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when connecting entities
- Ensure that the entities are close enough to be connected.
- Check that the connection points of the entities are not occupied by other entities.

### Errors when harvesting resources
- Move to the resource before attempting to harvest it.
- Ensure that the resource is within reach.

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Check that the entity has enough space to hold the item.
- Ensure that the item is available in the inventory.

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure that the pipes are connected to the correct entities.
- Check that the connection points of the pipes are not occupied by other entities.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a boiler or other entity that can use the pumped fluid.
- Check that the offshore pump is not too far from the entity it is trying to connect to.
